Theatre for your soul

KATHA GHERA IS A SELF SUSTAINING THEATRE COLLECTIVE WITH A DEEP PASSION
TOWARDS LISTENING, ENACTING AND WORKING WITH STORIES.

  • Get Started

Now Showing at Kausi Theater

दयालु रुख, an adaptation of Shel Silverstein's "The Giving Tree" is currently being staged.

Productions

We engage in intensive theater processes with an aim to put a production on stage.

Playback Theatre

Engage with us on an improvisational, interactive and intimate form of theatre where your own stories come to life.

Theater based intervention for groups

We use customized action based modules depending on the needs of the group, in areas such as team building, relationship dynamics and conflict management.

Collaborations

We are open to collaborations with other artists, educators or groups interested in using theatre tools to enhance their work processes.

Kausi Theater

A 130 seater black box theater open for rentals, collaborations and artistic junctions.

Community engagement and workshops

We employ theatre tools in order to engage with communities with a special focus on socio-political and psycho-social themes.

Friends of Katha Ghera

Friends with deep pockets and giving hearts, support us.
